briefdescription.para: Radius of the light source. If above 0 it will turn the light into an area light. Works only with PBR shaders.
Length of the light source. If above 0 and radius is above 0 it will create a tube light. Works only with PBR shaders.
Custom world transform for the light volume.
Shadow camera near/far clip distance ratio.
Process octree raycast. May be called from a worker thread.
Calculate distance and prepare batches for rendering. May be called from worker thread(s), possibly re-entrantly.
Visualize the component as debug geometry.

detaileddescription.para: Set light type. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set vertex lighting mode. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set color. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set temperature of the light in Kelvin. Modulates the light color when "use physical values" is enabled. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set area light radius. Greater than zero activates area light mode. Works only with PBR shaders. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set tube area light length. Works only with PBR shaders. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set use physical light values. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set specular intensity. Zero disables specular calculations. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set light brightness multiplier. Both the color and specular intensity are multiplied with this. When "use physical values" is enabled, the value is specified in lumens. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set range. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set spotlight field of view. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set spotlight aspect ratio. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set fade out start distance. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set shadow fade out start distance. Only has effect if shadow distance is also non-zero. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set shadow depth bias parameters. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set directional light cascaded shadow parameters. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set shadow map focusing parameters. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set light intensity in shadow between 0.0 - 1.0. 0.0 (the default) gives fully dark shadows. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set shadow resolution between 0.25 - 1.0. Determines the shadow map to use. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set shadow camera near/far clip distance ratio for spot and point lights. Does not affect directional lights, since they are orthographic and have near clip 0. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set maximum shadow extrusion for directional lights. The actual extrusion will be the smaller of this and camera far clip. Default 1000. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set range attenuation texture. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set spotlight attenuation texture. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return light type. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return vertex lighting mode. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return color. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return the temperature of the light in Kelvin. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return area light mode radius. Works only with PBR shaders. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return area tube light length. Works only with PBR shaders. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return if light uses temperature and brightness in lumens. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return the color value of the temperature in Kelvin. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return specular intensity. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return brightness multiplier. Specified in lumens when "use physical values" is enabled. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

Return effective color, multiplied by brightness and affected by temperature when "use physical values" is enabled. Alpha is always 1 so that can compare against the default black color to detect a light with no effect. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return effective specular intensity, multiplied by absolute value of brightness. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return range. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return spotlight field of view. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return spotlight aspect ratio. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return fade start distance. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return shadow fade start distance. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return shadow depth bias parameters. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return directional light cascaded shadow parameters. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return shadow map focus parameters. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return light intensity in shadow. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return shadow resolution. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return shadow camera near/far clip distance ratio. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return maximum shadow extrusion distance for directional lights. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return range attenuation texture. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return spotlight attenuation texture. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return spotlight frustum. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Return spotlight frustum in the specified view space.

detaileddescription.para: Return number of shadow map cascade splits for a directional light, considering also graphics API limitations. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether light has negative (darkening) color. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Set sort value based on intensity and view distance.
Set sort value based on overall intensity over a bounding box.
Set light queue used for this light. Called by View.
Return light queue. Called by View.
Return a divisor value based on intensity for calculating the sort value.

detaileddescription.para: Register object factory. Drawable must be registered first. NO_BIND

briefdescription.para: Return a transform for deferred fullscreen quad (directional light) rendering.
